title: Israel Army Says 2 Soldiers Killed In Gaza Helicopter Crash
content: The Israeli military said Wednesday that an army helicopter crashed in the south of war-ravaged Gaza overnight, killing two soldiers and injuring seven.
summary: The Israeli military said Wednesday that an army helicopter crashed in the south of war-ravaged Gaza overnight, killing two soldiers and injuring seven.

title: Gaza Carpenter Crafts Wooden Sandals For Daughters As War Rages
content: Twelve-year-old Heba Dawas lost her footwear in the chaos while fleeing Israel's military offensive in Gaza. So her carpenter father made wooden-soled sandals for her so she can tread more safely through the tonnes of rubble.
summary: Twelve-year-old Heba Dawas lost her footwear in the chaos while fleeing Israel's military offensive in Gaza. So her carpenter father made wooden-soled sandals for her so she can tread more safely through the tonnes of rubble.

title: Astronomers Spot Imminent Collision Of Black Holes in Nearby Galaxy
content: Astronomers have detected two closely spaced supermassive black holes in the galaxy MCG-03-34-64, located 800 million light-years away.
summary: Astronomers have detected two closely spaced supermassive black holes in the galaxy MCG-03-34-64, located 800 million light-years away.

title: Kamala Harris, Donald Trump Shake Hands At 9/11 Memorial After Fiery Debate
content: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump shook hands Wednesday at New York's 9/11 memorial to mark the anniversary of the attacks, hours after they clashed in a combustible TV debate.
summary: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump shook hands Wednesday at New York's 9/11 memorial to mark the anniversary of the attacks, hours after they clashed in a combustible TV debate.

title: S Jaishankar Calls On German Chancellor, Conveys Personal Greetings Of PM
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Wednesday called on German Chancellor Olaf Scholz in Berlin and conveyed the personal greetings of Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Wednesday called on German Chancellor Olaf Scholz in Berlin and conveyed the personal greetings of Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: World's Second Tallest Building To Feature The Highest Nightclub
content: Burj Azizi, set to become the world's second-tallest skyscraper at 725 meters, will feature the highest nightclub on level 126 and a seven-star all-suite hotel celebrating global cultures.
summary: Burj Azizi, set to become the world's second-tallest skyscraper at 725 meters, will feature the highest nightclub on level 126 and a seven-star all-suite hotel celebrating global cultures.

title: US Wants To Build "Best Friends Forever Relationship" With India: Envoy
content: The US wants to build a "BFF (best friends forever) relationship" with India, and a change of guard at the White House will not change ties between the two countries, US Ambassador Eric Garcetti said on Wednesday.
summary: The US wants to build a "BFF (best friends forever) relationship" with India, and a change of guard at the White House will not change ties between the two countries, US Ambassador Eric Garcetti said on Wednesday.

title: Want Good Ties With India But On Basis Of "Fairness": Muhammad Yunus
content: Bangladesh's Chief Adviser Dr Muhammad Yunus on Wednesday said his country wants good relations with India and other neighbouring nations it should be on the basis of "fairness and equality".
summary: Bangladesh's Chief Adviser Dr Muhammad Yunus on Wednesday said his country wants good relations with India and other neighbouring nations it should be on the basis of "fairness and equality".

title: 23 Years After 9/11 Attacks: US War On Terror And How It Changed The World
content: From the moment the first flight took off to the crash of Flight 93, in just two hours, the US was shaken to its core. The attack orchestrated by Osama Bin- laden's Al Qaeda killed 3,000 people.
summary: From the moment the first flight took off to the crash of Flight 93, in just two hours, the US was shaken to its core. The attack orchestrated by Osama Bin- laden's Al Qaeda killed 3,000 people.

title: Kamala Harris Beats Donald Trump 63%-37%, Post-Debate Survey Suggests
content: American voters broadly agree that Vice President Kamala Harris outperformed Donald Trump during Tuesday's presidential debate, according to a CNN poll of debate watchers conducted by SSRS, an independent research firm.
summary: American voters broadly agree that Vice President Kamala Harris outperformed Donald Trump during Tuesday's presidential debate, according to a CNN poll of debate watchers conducted by SSRS, an independent research firm.

title: "She'll Pay For It": Trump After Taylor Swift Endorses Harris For President
content: Taylor Swift, a self-declared "childless cat lady" and one of the world's most popular and influential stars, has endorsed Kamala Harris for president of the United States.
summary: Taylor Swift, a self-declared "childless cat lady" and one of the world's most popular and influential stars, has endorsed Kamala Harris for president of the United States.

title: Did Kamala Harris Wear Audio Earrings During Debate? All You Need To Know
content: These earrings, which resemble Nova H1 audio earrings, are designed to appear as stylish accessories while functioning as wireless earphones.

title: How A Bag Of Cheetos Unleashed Chaos In A Fragile US Cave Ecosystem
content: A recent incident at Carlsbad Caverns National Park, where a visitor dropped a half-empty bag of Cheetos, highlights the damaging effects of littering on fragile ecosystems.
summary: A recent incident at Carlsbad Caverns National Park, where a visitor dropped a half-empty bag of Cheetos, highlights the damaging effects of littering on fragile ecosystems.

title: China Man Gets 23 Teeth Extracted In One Day, Dies Of Heart Attack
content: The procedure involved extracting 23 teeth and inserting 12 implants in a single day using the "immediate restoration" method.
summary: The procedure involved extracting 23 teeth and inserting 12 implants in a single day using the "immediate restoration" method.

title: Married Colleagues In China, Fired For Kissing In Office, Sue Company
content: The employees have now filed a lawsuit against their former employer, alleging wrongful termination.

title: Cruise Ship Hits Ice in Alaska, Passengers Call It A "Titanic Moment"
content: The hull of the Carnival Spirit was assessed and no damages were found after the incident.

title: Japan Penguin Found Safe 2 Weeks After Escape, Keeper Calls It "A Miracle"
content: A fugitive penguin in Japan has been found safe and sound two weeks after escaping into the sea and paddling for miles, in what her keeper called a "miracle".
summary: A fugitive penguin in Japan has been found safe and sound two weeks after escaping into the sea and paddling for miles, in what her keeper called a "miracle".

title: Opinion: India-Pak Peace Is Possible - Only If Pak Army Takes A Back Seat
content: If India and Pakistan have tepid bilateral relations today, it is because the Pakistan army appears reluctant to allow civilian governments to build a warm relationship with India.
summary: If India and Pakistan have tepid bilateral relations today, it is because the Pakistan army appears reluctant to allow civilian governments to build a warm relationship with India.

title: Trump Makes Surprise 'Spin Room' Visit After Debate With Harris
content: Minutes after being hustled by Kamala Harris during their US presidential debate on Tuesday, Donald Trump appeared in front of reporters to get the last word.

title: Palestine Takes Seat Among UN Member States At 79th General Assembly Session
content: The 79th session of the UN General Assembly kicked off in New York with the presence of the representatives of Palestine, who have been given a seat in the General Assembly Hall next to the UN member states.
summary: The 79th session of the UN General Assembly kicked off in New York with the presence of the representatives of Palestine, who have been given a seat in the General Assembly Hall next to the UN member states.
